title: LG Will Spend $5.5 Billion on a Battery Factory in Arizona
description: Investment plans for U.S. battery production have increased since President Biden signed a law that offers generous incentives for electric cars and green energy.

title: How AI Chatbots Are Helping Some People Have Hard Conversations
description: Faced with challenging situations in parenting, romance or work, some are getting by with a little help from their A.I. friends.

title: Bard Fork, and How to Talk So Chatbots Will Listen
description: Google has unleashed its A.I. chatbot, Bard, to the world. And Spotify’s A.I. D.J. knows your taste — perhaps a little too well.
